tool.name: SAGA.statistics_regression.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayDEPENDENT False isArrayPREDICTORS False output_data_REGRESSION $output_data_REGRESSION name SAGA.statistics_regression.7 POINTS $POINTS DEPENDENT $DEPENDENT PREDICTORS $PREDICTORS LOGISTIC $LOGISTIC DW_WEIGHTING $DW_WEIGHTING DW_IDW_POWER $DW_IDW_POWER DW_IDW_OFFSET $DW_IDW_OFFSET DW_BANDWIDTH $DW_BANDWIDTH SEARCH_RANGE $SEARCH_RANGE SEARCH_RADIUS $SEARCH_RADIUS SEARCH_POINTS_ALL $SEARCH_POINTS_ALL SEARCH_POINTS_MIN $SEARCH_POINTS_MIN SEARCH_POINTS_MAX $SEARCH_POINTS_MAX SEARCH_DIRECTION $SEARCH_DIRECTION prefer $prefer response $response outputType_REGRESSION $OutputSection_REGRESSION.outputType_REGRESSION transmissionMode_REGRESSION $OutputSection_REGRESSION.transmissionMode_REGRESSION

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: DEPENDENT
param.label: Dependent Variable
param.help: Dependent Variable The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: PREDICTORS
param.label: Predictors
param.help: Predictors The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: DW_IDW_OFFSET
param.label: Inverse Distance Offset
param.help: Calculates weights for distance plus one, avoiding division by zero for zero distances

param.name: SEARCH_RADIUS
param.label: Maximum Search Distance
param.help: local maximum search distance given in map units

param.name: SEARCH_POINTS_MIN
param.label: Minimum
param.help: minimum number of points to use

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_REGRESSION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_REGRESSION
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Geographically Weighted Regression for multiple predictors. Regression details are stored in a copy of input points.
